Join us on Tuesday September the 16th for the first comedy night of the new season. New season, new venue, and... we lowered the entrance price !

Headlining this show, the incredible Benny Boot (Aus) Benny Boot (Australia) has been performing on the UK stand-up comedy circuit for 6yrs. Boot delivers his jokes in a unique style on variety of strange topics. His engaging persona & material keeps the laughter rolling through the entire show and is guaranteed to bring any audience undone.
